description:
In this talk, we'll learn about a highly controversial change to Python
syntax, the rationale for it, and the fallout as the result of it.

Along the way we'll go in-depth on how new ideas about Python are
proposed, discussed, and become part of the language, what's unique
about Python's process compared to other open source projects, and
recent developments and what they mean for the future of the wider
Python community.
title: PEP 572: The Walrus Operator
